coded_answer.p: Thank you very much for your letter, which I received yesterday. I am sure, that together we can spentspend a good student conference inat my college. I will give you nownow give you some useful information.

First of all, we come to some important points forabout the organisation. The group has been booked into a comfortabelcomfortable and well situatetsituatedwell-situated hotel, whose name is the ,,"Palace Hotel". The hotel is on the right handright-hand side of the Parker Piece, which you can find on the map, which I will send you. The ,,"Palace Hotel" is 5 minutesminutes' walkingwalk from the station. The conference is situatetsituatedtaking place in the building opposite the bus stop.

After a short speech from our director, the evening entertainment will be begin. In a well knowwell-known and enjoyablepleasant pub in the city centre we consumewill consumehave samesome food and drinks. FurthermoreAlso, there will be a very famous lifelive band. You do not have to wear some speciallspecialformal clothes.

You asked me for some suggestions for your free afternoon. Naturally we have a lot of interesting things to visit but some thingsomething that is speciallyspecial is our cathedralecathedral. The architecture bringbringstakes you back intoto the old timetimes. as well as the stained glass windows which are really amazing. We have alsoalso have an interesting museum and a modern theatre.
Finally, I am sure you and your group will spentspend some funnyenjoyable, realaxingrelaxing days here. Please do not hesitate to contact me for some more information.
I look forward to meeting each otheryou soon.
Inventions have affected all our lives!

What is it whatthat we use every day for many hours? Sometime'sSometimes from early in the morning until late in the evening. Yes, it is the TV. It is well knowwell known in almost all familyfamilies, often with a lot of different cannelschannels.

First of all, the TV can tellbring us news in a short time, about what happenedis happening all over the world. Another point in favour of the invention forof the TV is, that theyit tellingtellsshows about interesting reports, for instance about animals or the different culture fromof other countryscountries. Furthermore theythere haveare a lot of different programmeprogrammes, usually something for everybody. It couldcan be alsoalso be relaxing to sit on the sofa after a busy day at work. Finally, the TV is in my opinion very useful for getting important information, you can watchingwatch the weather and all of them were presentpresentedare presented in wonderful colour.

To sum up, in my opinion the TV is a very good and useful invention. However, theyit sendsendsshows a lot of violence which is not good for the children. I can notcannot imagine to liveliving without televisontelevision, it is something whatthat we need for our education, and for getting news and other helpful information.
